TEMPLATE_INPUT.description: HTML Fragment for the keyword input box

TEMPLATE_BUTTON.description: HTML Fragment for the search and reset buttons

_currentTimeoutID.description: Holds a reference to the current keypress timeout. Used for searching automatically after an elapsed period.

Y.DP.Search.name: Y.DP.Search

params.name: event
params.description: An Event Facade object with      the following attribute specific properties added:	<dl>		<dt>prevVal</dt>		<dd>The value of the attribute, prior to it being set</dd>		<dt>newVal</dt>		<dd>The value the attribute is to be set to</dd>		<dt>attrName</dt>		<dd>The name of the attribute being set</dd>		<dt>subAttrName</dt>		<dd>If setting a property within the attribute's value,           the name of the sub-attribute property being set</dd>	</dl>

timeoutChange.name: timeoutChange
timeoutChange.description: Fires when the value for the configuration attribute 'timeout' is changed. You can listen for the event using the on method if you wish to be notified before the attribute's value has changed, or using the after method if you wish to be notified after the attribute's value has changed.

_uiSetValue.description: Set the UI to reflect the 'value' attribute.

_handleInputEnterKey.description: Handle input got enter key event

_renderInput.description: Render the input node for the search terms

_defQueryUpdateFn.description: Default handler for queryUpdate : do nothing.

_renderButtons.description: Render the search and reset buttons

_uiSetField.description: Set the UI to reflect the 'field' attribute.

inputWrapper.description: Node reference to the wrapper around the input and pulldown elements.

resetButtonNode.description: Node reference to the reset search terms button

value.description: The search keyword(s). changing this fires a queryUpdate event.

timeout.description:
Timeout in milliseconds for search to submit the current terms
Submits the current search terms if the timeout specified has elapsed.

inputNode.description: Node reference to the INPUT which holds the search term.

searchButtonNode.description: Node reference to the search submit button

strings.description: Strings that can be used with internationalisation.

Y.DP.Search.description: Search widget which allows keyword searching and a specified search field.
